IEEE Guide for the Application of Surge-Protective Devices for Use on the Load Side of Service Equipment in Low-Voltage (1000 V or Less, 50 Hz or 60 Hz) AC Power Circuits--Amendment 1: SPD Disconnector Application Considerations and Coordination
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Std C62.72a-2020 (Amendment to IEEE Std C62.72-2016)

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: The application considerations for surge-protective device disconnectors and the coordination of these devices in low-voltage ac power circuits are defined in this amendment. Application consideration details, potential issues, and recommendations are provided.
